text: @WhiteHouse @Mike_Pence It's time to bring back the Coronavirus Task Force. It's time to bring back the CDC. Take the measures this very WH recommends. Even the greatest economy can't operate if workers are scared of lax saftey standards or are getting sick or dying in their absence.
